description: Persistent team-style tags for Leafs Dynasty AI v5. Used to remember how opponents play across seasons and feed into archetypes, gameplans, and goalie/slider decisions.

tag_definitions.chaos_forecheck: High-pressure, turnover-hunting forecheck that thrives on broken plays and mistakes.
tag_definitions.weak_side_lock: Aggressive forecheck that overloads strong side and locks weak side lanes.
tag_definitions.shooting_pp: Power play style built around high-volume shots from the point and circles.
tag_definitions.curl_shooters: Forwards who repeatedly curl off the wall/half-boards and shoot from the circles.
tag_definitions.high_pressure_dz: Defensive zone behavior that attacks puck carriers aggressively instead of collapsing.
tag_definitions.rebound_danger_team: Team that generates a high volume of rebounds and chaos near the crease.
tag_definitions.slow_team: Skates and transitions slower; relies more on structure than pure speed.
tag_definitions.umbrella_pp: Umbrella power play with a primary flank shooter (e.g., Ovi spot) and high rotation up top.
tag_definitions.ovi_flank_priority: PP setup heavily biased to left/right circle one-timer threat.
tag_definitions.nz_1_2_2_blue_trap: Neutral zone 1-2-2 Blue line trap, forcing dumps and slow entries.
tag_definitions.weak_pair3: Third defense pair is a clear weak point that can be targeted consistently.
tag_definitions.rebound_farm_goalie: Opponent goalie is prone to leaving dangerous rebounds; prime candidate for low shots and net crashes.

DET.name: Detroit Red Wings
DET.notes: Detroit thrives on chaos, aggressive forecheck pressure, and shooting power play volume. Treat them as a high-event, turnover-hunting team and keep trap slider lower early.

WSH.name: Washington Capitals
